contextId.information: Rebekah is exaggerating to emphasize how upset she is about the Hittite women that Esau married. AT: "I am terribly upset" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
Rachel is using hyperbole to show how upset she is about not having children. AT: "I will feel completely worthless" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
